history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: new_state_insr_def_dta,reconnaissance_ind. qsimpl time: 1 use: new_state_insr_def_dta,reconnaissance_ind. qsimpl time: 1 use: new_state_insr_def_dta,reconnaissance_ind.

exceptions.tactic: apply reconnaissance_ind with (P := fun p a t _ => new_state_insr_def_dta p a t r).
exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term r : reconnaissance p a t p0 : preDTA a0 : ad t0 : term y : ?T@{p0:=p; a0:=a; t0:=t; p:=p0; a:=a0; t:=t0} The term "r" has type "reconnaissance p a t" while it is expected to have type "reconnaissance p0 a0 t0".

exceptions.tactic: intros d a0 t0 ladj e s H.
intros d a0 t0 ladj e s H'.

exceptions.exn: The reference s was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variables p, a, t.

In environment H0 : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t X, P : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term), reconnaissance d0 a0 t0 -> Prop p : preDTA a : ad t : term r : reconnaissance p a t Unable to unify "reconnaissance p a t" with "P p a t r".

original: intros p a t r. apply reconnaissance_ind with (P := fun p a t _ => new_state_insr_def_dta p a t r). - intros d a0 t0 ladj e s H. apply new_state_insr_0 with (s := s) (e := e). apply H. - apply r.
